title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“We've been buried before, but we've never had dirt thrown in our faces.” [Coach Riley of the Philadelphia Lakers, as quoted in the Los Angeles Times, May 28, 1985. Submitted by Jean MacAllister, Beverly Hills.]
